name: Shoulder Press, Dumbbells
how_to_perform:
1. Stand or sit with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder height, with your palms facing forward.
2. Engage your core by pulling your belly button towards your spine, ensuring that your hips do not sag or pike upwards throughout the movement.
3. Press one dumbbell straight up over your head, keeping your elbow close to your ear and avoiding arching in your lower back.
4. Lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
5. Alternate with the other dumbbell, mimicking a see-saw motion by pressing one dumbbell up while lowering the other one back down.
6. Ensure that your movements are controlled throughout each repetition.
short_summary: Shoulder press with dumbbells works multiple muscle groups in the upper body including shoulders and triceps, performed using handheld weights.
